title: dhEvi raamE
sahitya:
dEvi ramE mAmavAbdhi tanayE dEva dEva vAsudEva jAyE

anupallavi

pAvana kanakAdri vara nilayE dEvAdi vinuta mahimAti shriyE


caraNam

rAkAdIsha sannibha vadanE rAjIva lOchanE gaja gamanE
lOkAnanda vidhAyinE  lOkavidhita kIrtishAlinE akArAdi varna
svarUpinE tava karunApUrna bhaktAnAm anupama saubhAgya
dAyinE amudAnanda sandOha dAyinE
